text: @HoarseWisperer @realDonaldTrump He’s right it will kill you. It’s silly that you’re taking it when you don’t have the Coronavirus. You get daily Coronavirus tests when Americanas can’t get them. So, why possibly harm your body. You wouldn’t have to worry if you and others in the WH would have worn masks.
